New tour

Sparse Spikes Deconvolution over the Space of Measures

Posted by Gabriel Peyré on October 12, 2013

This tour explores the resolution of the sparse deconvolution problem in a grid-free maner. This is achieved by solving a dual problem, which can be re-casted into an SDP convex optimization program.
